messages.message:
We have this related ticket also to consider opening provenance docs without the full file panel - [DR-4136] Open chatbot provenance docs without full file panel - Jira (atlassian.net (http://atlassian.net)) (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/DR-4136)

cc: @Natasha as you look at chat UX overall
great call, @Rosie it was intended to be sticky so I think this is a bug.

Regarding positioning, I agree it could make sense to position it where the panel would come from.

FAB’s (floating action buttons) sit above other items on the page and conventionally they’re in the bottom right or sometimes top right of pages. But, it’s possible to position them elsewhere.

I will defer to Natasha for what’s to be done about this in the future.

https://m3.material.io/components/floating-action-button/guidelines updated docs say they can be positioned anywhere. Just stating above where I usually see them and older documentation says right side of screens usually.
